Verses: 1 karththaave, Neer Ennai Aaraaindhu, Arindhirukkireer.
2 en Utkaarudhalaiyum En Ezhundhirukkudhalaiyum Neer Arindhirukkireer; En Ninaivugalaith Dhooraththilirundhu Arigireer.
3 naan Nadandhaalum Paduththirundhaalum Ennaich Soozhndhirukkireer; En Vazhigalellaam Umakkuth Theriyum.
4 en Naavil Sol Piravaadhadharkumunne, Idho, Karththaave, Adhaiyellaam Neer Arindhirukkireer.
5 murpuraththilum Pirpuraththilum Neer Ennai Nerukki, Umadhu Karaththai Enmel Vaikkireer.
6 indha Arivu Enakku Migundha Aachchariyamum, Enakku Ettaadha Uyaramumaayirukkiradhu.
7 ummudaiya Aavikku Maraivaaga Enge Poven? Ummudaiya Samugaththaivittu Enge Oduven?
8 naan Vaanaththirku Erinaalum, Neer Ange Irukkireer; Naan Paadhaalaththil Padukkai Pottaalum, Neer Angeyum Irukkireer.
9 naan Vidiyarkaalaththuch Settaigalai Eduththu, Samuththiraththin Kadaiyaandharangalile Poith Thanginaalum,
10 angeyum Umadhu Kai Ennai Nadaththum, Umadhu Valadhukaram Ennaip Pidikkum.
11 irul Ennai Moodikkollumendraalum, Iravum Ennaich Sutri Velichchamaayirukkum.
12 umakku Maraivaaga Irulum Andhagaarappaduththaadhu; Iravum Pagalaippola Velichchamaayirukkum; Umakku Irulum Velichchamum Sari.
13 neer En Ullindhiriyangalaik Kaikkondirukkireer; En Thaayin Karppaththil Ennaik Kaappaatrineer.
14 naan Biramikkaththakka Adhisayamaai Undaakkappattapadiyaal, Ummaith Thudhippen; Umadhu Kiriyaigal Adhisayamaanavaigal, Adhu En Aaththumaavukku Nandraaith Theriyum.
15 naan Olippidaththile Undaakkappattu, Boomiyin Thaazhvidangalile Visiththira Vinodhamaai Uruvaakkappattapodhu, En Elumbugal Umakku Maraivaayirukkavillai.
16 en Karuvai Ummudaiya Kangal Kandadhu; En Avayavangalil Ondraagilum Illaadhapodhe Avaigal Anaiththum, Avaigal Uruverpadum Naatkalum, Umadhu Pusdhagaththil Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.
17 dhevane, Umadhu Aalosanaigal Enakku Eththanai Arumaiyaanavaigal; Avaigalin Thogai Evvalavu Adhigam.
18 avaigalai Naan Ennapponaal, Manalaippaarkkilum Adhigamaam; Naan Vizhikkumpodhu Innum Ummandaiyil Irukkiren.
19 dhevane, Neer Dhunmaarkkanai Azhiththeeraanaal Nalamaayirukkum; Raththappiriyare, Neengal Ennaivittu Agandrupongal.
20 avargal Ummaik Kuriththuth Dhunmaarkkamaaip Pesugiraargal; Ummudaiya Saththurukkal Umadhu Naamaththai Veenaai Vazhangugiraargal.
21 karththaave, Ummaip Pagaikkiravargalai Naan Pagaiyaamalum, Umakku Virodhamaai Ezhumpugiravargalai Aruvarukkaamalum Iruppeno?
22 muzhuppagaiyaai Avargalaip Pagaikkiren; Avargalai Enakkup Pagaignaraaga Ennugiren.
23 dhevane, Ennai Aaraaindhu, En Irudhayaththai Arindhukollum; Ennaich Sodhiththu, En Sindhanaigalai Arindhukollum.
24 vedhanai Undaakkum Vazhi Ennidaththil Undo Endru Paarththu Niththiya Vazhiyile Ennai Nadaththum.
